title: Our nation has limited entrepreneurs. Why? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, have you notices the NEWS going viral about Patanjali’s declining revenue charts? Well, even for a business running on that level and giving people a blind fold about “desi products” and other marketing funda, complex GST structures and broken supply chains systems gave a huge dent! Here in Finchot’s small article, you can check how bad governance and paperwork can pull a startup back to the ground! Patanjali is a big name though! When you talk about small businesses and startups, from hiring people to landing loans in India is not easy. Gone are those days when a person can single handedly run an entire business operations including sales and marketing. The digital age is touching India, though you can not handle multiple things in this fast moving and going viral generation. Because of poor education system and no proper skill-driven training is making India entrepreneur’s chance of getting successful limited. Happy entrepreneurship to you!
